sentences.en: All the time they agonize and pray.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在忍受苦痛并且祈祷.

sentences.en: All the way home she agonized about what she should do.
sentences.cn: 回家一路上，她都在发愁该怎么办。

sentences.en: As a mother, I agonize over what my children will inherit.
sentences.cn: 作为一个母亲，我对我的孩子们将要继承的东西感到极度痛苦。

sentences.en: Don't stress, don't agonize – just go with the flow.
sentences.cn: 简单,就是不要有压力, 不要烦恼-只要随心而动.

sentences.en: Fisher and Martinez did not agonize over anything.
sentences.cn: 可费蛇耳和马丁内兹从来不受任何事情折磨.

sentences.en: I agonize for a while before buying a new toothbrush.
sentences.cn: 而我,在买一支牙刷之前还要挣扎一番.

sentences.en: Why do you agonize yourself with the thought of your failure?
sentences.cn: 你为何总是对于你的失败念念不忘而自我折磨 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 感到极度痛苦的，苦闷的
苦恼；极大的痛苦；临死的挣扎
使极度痛苦（agonize的过去分词）
使极度痛苦；折磨（agonize的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: to think about a difficult decision very carefully and with a lot of effort

trans.tran_cn: 苦斗，苦苦思索，感到极度痛苦，苦闷
